EmailTemplate.description: This is sent to Evolution when 1 or both referees do not respond
EmailTemplate.name: SF to Evolution: No referee response
EmailTemplate.subject: No response from referee(s) to reference request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
One or both referees have responded with "No" to the question, "Would you be happy for {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} to work with young people?"
Please check their Job Application and follow up with a call to the referee to ascertain the nature of this response. If their reasons are valid, tick the "Reject due to unacceptable references" checkbox.
Click on the link to view the record {!Job_Application__c.Link}.
This is a standard email, sent automatically when Referee 1 Response and/or Referee 2 Response = "No"
